companies.description: During the summer of 2023 I will have the opportunity to work with a team of talented engineers to work on effective UI/UX code and design.
Developed full stack work on a team focused primarily on UI and UX (TESLA Team). On this team, I built multiple core features for a major release.
Fashioned new features for Axate's primary application while working on a team of three. Designed and implemented changes to the front page of their primary application.
Designed and programmed native iOS and Android apps that are relied on by patients and providers to ask questions and submit refill requests to their practitioner.
